planner_edit_plan: Repaint the worn road edge line to a crisp, bright white so the lane boundary is clearly visible.
critic_notes: The road edge line on the left has been repainted to a crisp, bright white and follows the existing curb geometry with plausible perspective/brightness. No obvious changes to camera viewpoint, global lighting, or surrounding objects are noticeable.

planner_edit_plan: Repaint the crosswalk marking to make the white stripes brighter and more solid.
critic_notes: The crosswalk stripes in the edited image do not appear brighter/more solid; instead there are noticeable global changes (overall tone/contrast shift and altered road marking artifacts near the bottom center). The edit should be localized only to the crosswalk marking: increase the whiteness/opacity of the existing crosswalk stripes while keeping their exact shape/position and leaving the rest of the scene unchanged.
